info.name: ANN Except It's Good
info.description: removes reviews, features, and columns from animenewsnetwork so i dont get a fucking rage migraine every time i want to read up on the latest cartoon news.
info.additionalInfo:
• this doesnt just remove links from the thumbnails, it actually blanks out entire articles. very useful to keep yourself from hatereading.
  • interest articles get to stay because theyre Actually News and i find them inoffensive. just apply display: none to .interest if u wanna remove them.
  • recommended for use with ad block plus so you dont get funimations giant titty ads shoved in your face all of the time.
  • everything in the encyclopedia still works, if u wanna use that for whatever reason.

data.title: 'so i dont get a fucking rage migraine every time i want to read up on the latest cartoon news'
